item.title: Sarah add a quote by Banana Yoshimoto
item.description: "When things get really bad, you take comfort in the placeness of a place." -- Banana Yoshimoto

item.title: Sarah add a quote by CLAMP
item.description:
"Oh this? It's a 'bookworm.'
They live in books, and they love to eat important or valuable words." -- CLAMP

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Rick Riordan
item.description: "But yes. Come, faulty dragon people. Follow us." -- Rick Riordan

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Bucky Sinister
item.description: "<i>Maximum Rocknroll</i> didn't have a map section. How was I supposed to know that Berkeley was not a neighborhood of San Francisco?" -- Bucky Sinister

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Jimmy Gownley
item.description: "...which, of course, is how I developed my love for both Kabuki theater and marshmallow Peeps." -- Jimmy Gownley

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Elizabeth Hand
item.description: "If the retreat house was a trap, it was a very nice one." -- Elizabeth Hand

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Caroline C. Leighton
item.description: "Sailors approaching the coast in a fog can recognize the Santa Barbara Channel by the smell of bitumen which floats on the water." -- Caroline C. Leighton

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Caroline C. Leighton
item.description: "The only way we know summer is coming is by the more chilling winds, the increased dust, the tawny color of the hills, and the general dying look of things." -- Caroline C. Leighton

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Alan Bradley
item.description: "Chicken fizz! O Lord, protect all of us who toil in the vineyards of experimental chemistry!" -- Alan Bradley

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Daniel Manus Pinkwater
item.description: "Incidentally, I don't know how late you were planning to stay, but there is an excellent film this evening <i>The Snake Pit</i>. It's a wonderful comedy. I've seen it several times." -- Daniel Manus Pinkwater

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Ammon Shea
item.description: "Telephone books are, like dictionaries, already out of date the moment they are printed...." -- Ammon Shea

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Ammon Shea
item.description: "...Zachary winched a few more letters onto his last name and declared himself king of the Z aficionados." -- Ammon Shea

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Ammon Shea
item.description: "For the benefit of those half-dozen people who will see a name like Gwillim and put this book down in order to go look it up to see where it comes from &mdash; it is the Welsh version of William" -- Ammon Shea

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Ammon Shea
item.description: "[U]se extreme caution, and please remember that 451 degrees Fahrenheit is more than just a book a title...." -- Ammon Shea

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Jim Davis
item.description: "In my head, the sky is blue, the grass is green and cats are orange." -- Jim Davis

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Kiyohiko Azuma
item.description:
"Sakaki: "...Why can't we just talk it over...?"
Tomo: "You can't talk to cats." -- Kiyohiko Azuma

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Bucky Sinister
item.description: "Q: How do you tell when there's an elephant in the pit? A: Peanut shells on the floor." -- Bucky Sinister

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Bucky Sinister
item.description: "Q: What's the difference between a tweaker and an elephant? A: The elephant will eat all your peanut butter." -- Bucky Sinister

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Alfred Hitchcock
item.description: "I can't read fiction without visualizing every scene. The result is it becomes a series of pictures rather than a book." -- Alfred Hitchcock

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Alfred Hitchcock
item.description: "The picture's over. Now I have to go and put it on film." -- Alfred Hitchcock

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "Every teenager in the world feels like that, feels broken or out of place, different somehow, royalty mistakenly born into a family of peasants. The difference in your case is that it's true." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Rob Reger
item.description: "This other time, Attikol had the streets of San Francisco rearranged just so this lady's favorite show <i>The Streets of San Francisco</i> would be more accurate." -- Rob Reger

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Frank W. Dormer
item.description: "Got sock? Foot cold." -- Frank W. Dormer

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Gail Carson Levine
item.description: "A library is infinity under a roof." -- Gail Carson Levine
